languages.text: "У ксеносов нет душ. Но это не значит, что им неведомы страдания. Пускай же напьются вдоволь".

traits.locale_text: "У ксеносов нет душ. Но это не значит, что им неведомы страдания. Пускай же напьются вдоволь".

languages.text: "Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."
languages.original_text: "У ксеносов нет душ. Но это не значит, что им неведомы страдания. Пускай же напьются вдоволь".

traits.locale_text: "Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."
"Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."
"Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."
"Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."
"Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."
"Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."

languages.text: «Los xenos no tienen alma, pero eso no significa que no conozcan el sufrimiento. Que se sacien de él».
languages.original_text: "Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."

languages.text: 「異種族に魂はない。ですが、それは奴らが苦痛を知らないということではない。好きなだけ飲ませてやろう」
languages.original_text: "Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."

languages.text: “异形没有灵魂，但这并不意味着他们体会不到痛苦。让他们得到应得的痛苦吧。”
languages.original_text: "Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."

languages.text: "Xenos haben keine Seelen. Aber das heißt nicht, dass sie kein Leid kennen. Sollen Sie sich satt essen."
languages.original_text: "Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."

languages.text: « Les xénos n'ont pas d'âme, mais cela ne signifie pas pour autant qu'ils ne connaissent pas la souffrance. Laissez-les boire tout leur soûl. »
languages.original_text: "Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."
"Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."

languages.text: "Zenoların ruhu yoktur. Bu demek değildir ki acı çekmenin ne olduğunu bilmezler. Bırakalım susuzluklarını gidersinler."
languages.original_text: "Xenos have no souls. But that does not mean they do not know suffering. Let them drink their fill."
